content: Protocols are in place to decrease the infection risk in PD patients and prevent complications of peritoneal dialysis. These include proper catheter placement, exit-site care including Staphylococcus aureus prophylaxis, careful training of patients with periodic re-training, prevention of contamination, and prevention of procedure-related and fungal peritonitis.
